item.title: Finding the Modal School District
item.description: My good friend Ryan Estrellado recommended an NRP Planet Money podcast episode on the “Modal American.” Working with Ben Casselman, they explored the most ‘typical’ American. It was a fantastic, engaging episode about a common statistical technique that I’ve never seen applied in this way before. They ran the numbers on a variety of demographic variables to see what group made up of the combination of those variables is the most common in the U.
